summary: A comprehensive pytest-based test suite for the SecureDrop client, covering fixtures, factories, and unit/integration tests for configuration handling, cryptographic utilities, export processes, application logic, data models, job queue management, resource loading, storage synchronization, Alembic migrations, and miscellaneous utilities.
business_intent: To automatically verify the correctness, security, and stability of the SecureDrop client across its core components, ensuring that changes do not introduce regressions and that the application behaves as expected in production environments.
